00016 class AnimationBmpIterator {
00017     public:
00018         virtual INT BitmapCount() const = 0;
00019         virtual const BitmapRes* operator()(INT idx) const = 0;
00020 };
00021 
00023 class AnimationBmpArrayIterator : public AnimationBmpIterator {
00024     public:
00025         AnimationBmpArrayIterator(INT bmp_count = 0, const BitmapRes *bmp = 0);
00026 
00027         virtual INT BitmapCount() const { return m_bmp_count; }
00028         virtual const BitmapRes* operator()(INT idx) const {
00029             ASSERT(idx >= 0 && idx < m_bmp_count);
00030             return &m_bmp[idx];
00031         }
00032 
00033         void Init(INT bmp_count, const BitmapRes *bmp) {
00034             m_bmp_count = bmp_count;
00035             m_bmp = bmp;
00036         }
00037 
00038     private:
00039         INT m_bmp_count;
00040         const BitmapRes *m_bmp;
00041 };
00042 
00043 
00045 class AnimationBmpPointerArrayIterator : public AnimationBmpIterator {
00046     public:
00047         typedef const BitmapRes* CBitmapResPtr;
00048 
00049         AnimationBmpPointerArrayIterator(INT bmp_count = 0, const CBitmapResPtr *bmp = 0);
00050 
00051         virtual INT BitmapCount() const { return m_bmp_count; }
00052         virtual const BitmapRes* operator()(INT idx) const {
00053             ASSERT(idx >= 0 && idx < m_bmp_count);
00054             return m_bmp[idx];
00055         }
00056 
00057         void Init(INT bmp_count, const CBitmapResPtr *bmp) {
00058             m_bmp_count = bmp_count;
00059             m_bmp = bmp;
00060         }
00061 
00062     private:
00063         INT m_bmp_count;
00064         const CBitmapResPtr *m_bmp;
00065 };

00068 class AnimationModel : public Model {
00069     typedef Model Base;
00070 
00071     public:
00073         AnimationModel();
00074 
00076         void SetIndex(INT index) { m_index = index; };
00077 
00079         INT GetIndex() const { return m_index; };
00080 
00082         void SetBmpIterator(const AnimationBmpIterator *bmp_it) { m_bmp_it = bmp_it; }
00083 
00085         const AnimationBmpIterator* GetBmpIterator() const { return m_bmp_it; }
00086 
00088         const BitmapRes& GetActiveBitmap() const { return *m_bmp_it->operator()(m_index); }
00089 
00090     private:
00091         INT             m_index;
00092         const AnimationBmpIterator *m_bmp_it;
